Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: FsxFilesystemArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx for Lustre file system.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx for Lustre file system.

properties.name: SecurityGroupArns
properties.description: The ARNs of the security groups that are to use to configure the FSx for Lustre file system.

type.description: The ARNs of the security groups that are to use to configure the FSx for Lustre file system.

properties.name: Subdirectory
properties.description: A subdirectory in the location's path.

type.description: A subdirectory in the location's path.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: LocationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon FSx for Lustre file system location that is created.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon FSx for Lustre file system location that is created.

properties.name: LocationUri
properties.description: The URL of the FSx for Lustre location that was described.

type.description: The URL of the FSx for Lustre location that was described.
